text:
Hi <@U7SL518D6> - Why `hs filemanager`  has no `fetch` option available ? It would be very useful when you will switch off FTP.
We heavily operate on files under `ftp/accountID_accountName/content/files`  and now we will be stuck ! - because we do not have access there differently than over FTP - or we will be forced to build some mechanism over API.
